QuestData.Title: Doorway in the Dark
QuestData.Description:
I fear our efforts to stop Zovaal have been thwarted, mortal.
A doorway has been opened to a forbidden realm... and the Banished One has reclaimed a power taken from him long ago.
I sense your allies returning from the Sanctum of Domination. I must know every detail of what transpired.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak to Thrall and witness the end of the battle in Torghast.

Objectives.Objective: Ask Thrall what happened in Torghast
